Title: About
Content:
My name is Eben Olivier. Farther, Husband, Chef and developer.

My main area in develpment is Dotnet Core. I am aslo into Web(Html,jscript,Jquery,bootstrap etc). I have experience in mvc and love the middleware architecture featured in dotnet core. 

I've been actively developed in Dotnet sinse 2003 and also have experience in WPF, MSSql, OLAP services and data mining.

My new adventures involve blogging and traveling around the world to discover new cultures and adventures. To view this you can follow me on uslovingwanderlust.com
